doc: A -struct is used to pass information about the tested file to .

fields.doc: Flags indicating which of the following fields need are filled
fields.name: contains

fields.doc: the filename of the file being tested
fields.name: filename

fields.doc: the URI for the file being tested
fields.name: uri

fields.doc: the string that will be used to display the file in the file chooser
fields.name: display_name

name: FileFilterInfo
